A little embarrassing Topley to Azhar Ali,1 run,oh dear, Topley's had a bit of a shocker there! Moeen does well to settle under a steepler

To be fair, he didn't respond to the initial call and was then up the creek

17.5.text: Rashid to Azhar Ali, 1 run, pushed through on middle and leg, Azhar clips through midwicket Rashid to Azhar Ali,1 run,pushed through on middle and leg, Azhar clips through midwicket

47.1.text: Topley to Wahab Riaz, no run, full and straight, aims to swing down the ground, slices as the bat turns and lobs towards mid-off but he declines the single Topley to Wahab Riaz,no run,full and straight, aims to swing down the ground, slices as the bat turns and lobs towards mid-off but he declines the single

47.3.text: Topley to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, Topley to Wahab Riaz,1 run,dropped! A blemish from England. He heaves this into the leg side, picks out deep square where Root shells one that he would normally swallow

36.2.text: Rashid to Anwar Ali, no run, appeal for lbw, full around leg stump, Anwar probs forward, probably not straightening enough...might have pitched outside leg, too Rashid to Anwar Ali,no run,appeal for lbw, full around leg stump, Anwar probs forward, probably not straightening enough...might have pitched outside leg, too

47.5.text: Topley to Mohammad Irfan, no run, full outside off, jabbed to point...crowd cheering the blocks from Irfan Topley to Mohammad Irfan,no run,full outside off, jabbed to point...crowd cheering the blocks from Irfan

47.2.text: Topley to Wahab Riaz, Topley to Wahab Riaz,SIX,he's connected this time! Almost a slog-sweep, goes down on one knee and picks it from outside off with a mighty swing over deep midwicket

47.6.text: Topley to Mohammad Irfan, no run, a straight, low full toss which is carefully pushed to cover so he survives the over Topley to Mohammad Irfan,no run,a straight, low full toss which is carefully pushed to cover so he survives the over

46.4.text: Woakes to Mohammad Irfan, no run, full outside off, driven to cover Woakes to Mohammad Irfan,no run,full outside off, driven to cover

46.5.text: Woakes to Mohammad Irfan, no run, yorker, dug out to the off side Woakes to Mohammad Irfan,no run,yorker, dug out to the off side

46.6.text: Woakes to Mohammad Irfan, no run, full and straight, manages to keep it out with a nudge to mid-on Woakes to Mohammad Irfan,no run,full and straight, manages to keep it out with a nudge to mid-on

46.1.text: Woakes to Zafar Gohar, 2 runs, lovely strike and, I think, superb fielding...lofted straight down the ground over mid-off, but it doesn't skip across the outfield and gets flicked back Woakes to Zafar Gohar,2 runs,lovely strike and, I think, superb fielding...lofted straight down the ground over mid-off, but it doesn't skip across the outfield and gets flicked back

46.2.text: Woakes to Zafar Gohar, no run, swing and a miss to a full ball outside off Woakes to Zafar Gohar,no run,swing and a miss to a full ball outside off

5.1.text: Topley to Babar Azam, Topley to Babar Azam,FOUR,that's a strong drive, a stride forward and although he wasn't to the pitch he just strikes clean thorugh the line

5.3.text: Topley to Azhar Ali, 1 run, tucked into the leg side Topley to Azhar Ali,1 run,tucked into the leg side

41.1.text: Topley to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, angled down to third man Topley to Shoaib Malik,1 run,angled down to third man

29.5.text: Willey to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, back of a length, tucked away through square Willey to Sarfraz Ahmed,1 run,back of a length, tucked away through square

5.4.text: Topley to Babar Azam, 1 run, flicked down to long leg Topley to Babar Azam,1 run,flicked down to long leg

29.6.text: Willey to Shoaib Malik, 1 run, goes across his stumps and flicks his first ball away for a run Willey to Shoaib Malik,1 run,goes across his stumps and flicks his first ball away for a run

29.1.text: Willey to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, length ball around the line of off, pushed in front of square Willey to Mohammad Hafeez,1 run,length ball around the line of off, pushed in front of square

29.3.text: Willey to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, length ball, dabbed into the covers Willey to Mohammad Hafeez,no run,length ball, dabbed into the covers

29.2.text: Willey to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 leg bye, low full toss from Willey, the cat-like Sarfraz is low in the crease and into the sweep early, picks out backward square but runs anyway, a direct hit would have been close... Think there was a vain lbw appeal, too, but must have been glove/bat on it first Willey to Sarfraz Ahmed,1 leg bye,low full toss from Willey, the cat-like Sarfraz is low in the crease and into the sweep early, picks out backward square but runs anyway, a direct hit would have been close... Think there was a vain lbw appeal, too, but must have been glove/bat on it first

15.1.text: Rashid to Azhar Ali, no run, uses his feet, nicely bowled with a touch more air, pushes to the off side Rashid to Azhar Ali,no run,uses his feet, nicely bowled with a touch more air, pushes to the off side

15.2.text: Rashid to Azhar Ali, 1 run, short this time, spins away outside off, cut to deep cover Rashid to Azhar Ali,1 run,short this time, spins away outside off, cut to deep cover

15.3.text: Rashid to Mohammad Hafeez, Rashid to Mohammad Hafeez,FOUR,just over mid-on! Hafeez wanting to attack Rashid again, goes for the lofted option, the bat twisted in his hands a touch, didn't quite get the elevation he wanted but just enough to beat the man on the edge of the circle

15.4.text: Rashid to Mohammad Hafeez, Rashid to Mohammad Hafeez,SIX,this one has the distance! Down the pitch again, swings it very high into the air and it has the distance to land over the rope at long-on although not by much

5.6.text: Topley to Azhar Ali, no run, very full, on the popping crease, driven off the bottom of the bat towards mid-off...Azhar struggling a little Topley to Azhar Ali,no run,very full, on the popping crease, driven off the bottom of the bat towards mid-off...Azhar struggling a little

15.6.text: Rashid to Azhar Ali, 1 run, full toss which dips down the leg side, tickled fine of short fine-leg Rashid to Azhar Ali,1 run,full toss which dips down the leg side, tickled fine of short fine-leg

44.3.text: Willey to Wahab Riaz, no run, full outside off, he drives over the top of it Willey to Wahab Riaz,no run,full outside off, he drives over the top of it

49.4.text: Woakes to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, now he tries to scoop, gets across outside off and flicks it behind square on the leg side Woakes to Wahab Riaz,1 run,now he tries to scoop, gets across outside off and flicks it behind square on the leg side

48.2.text: Willey to Wahab Riaz, no run, top edge, but falls into space! And in the end it's a dot ball. Back of a length, heaves to the leg side, takes a top edge and doesn't carry to long on Willey to Wahab Riaz,no run,top edge, but falls into space! And in the end it's a dot ball. Back of a length, heaves to the leg side, takes a top edge and doesn't carry to long on

48.3.text: Willey to Wahab Riaz, no run, cracked straight down the ground this time and the run is declined again Willey to Wahab Riaz,no run,cracked straight down the ground this time and the run is declined again

48.1.text: Willey to Wahab Riaz, no run, a yorker which is driven firmly to cover who is on the edge of the circle Willey to Wahab Riaz,no run,a yorker which is driven firmly to cover who is on the edge of the circle

48.6.text: Willey to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, works a low full toss into the vacant midwicket area and trots the single Willey to Wahab Riaz,1 run,works a low full toss into the vacant midwicket area and trots the single

48.4.text: Willey to Wahab Riaz, Willey to Wahab Riaz,SIX,this time he gets it! Short of a length, Wahab keeps swinging hard and he muscles it over deep midwicket to bring up Pakistan's 200

48.5.text: Willey to Wahab Riaz, no run, full on the pads, deflects into the leg side, straight back to the bowler so can't get the single Willey to Wahab Riaz,no run,full on the pads, deflects into the leg side, straight back to the bowler so can't get the single

47.4.text: Topley to Mohammad Irfan, no run, that came out wrong, a loopy full toss slower ball which Irfan lets through to the keeper then questions if it should have been a no-ball. Waist height to Irfan is a beaming to other players Topley to Mohammad Irfan,no run,that came out wrong, a loopy full toss slower ball which Irfan lets through to the keeper then questions if it should have been a no-ball.
